Uses of MessagingService in group
 

Fields in group declared as MessagingService
(package private)  MessagingService GroupService.messagingService
          The GroupService uses the MessagingService for sending messages to other users.

Uses of MessagingService in userIO
 

Fields in userIO declared as MessagingService
(package private)  MessagingService UserIO.messagingService
          The user interface uses the MessagingService to get the list (or a partial one) of messages in the user's Mailbox.
